attributes.action: Vote for Public sector pension reforms
attributes.additional_details:
Our taxes pay public sector pensions, they do not pay the private sector pensions. They get more holidays and better perks - why should they be treated different.  No gold-plated guaranteed public sector pensions should be allowed in this day and age, they are no different to the average working person.
They not only want more out of us but they are going to strike, we pay their salaries and they are holding us to ransom.
The Government need your support in this matter.
